short_summary: Telecommunication Technician and Private Branch Exchange Technologist
description: This is a new requirement. This requirement is open only to those TBIPS Supply Arrangement Holders EN578-170432 who qualified under Tier 2 for services in the National Capital Region for the following categories:",
full_summary:
### Telecommunication Technician and Private Branch Exchange Technologist

#### Tender Number: W6369-22-P5OI/C

* **Publication Date:** 2022-09-29
* **Tender Closing Date:** 2022-10-04T14:00:00
* **Tender Status:** Expired

#### Contract Overview

The Department of National Defence (DND) is issuing a Request for Proposal (RFP) for the services of a Telecommunication Technician and a Private Branch Exchange (PBX) Technologist. The duration of the contract will be three (3) years with an optional two (2) year extension.

#### Scope of Work

The DND requires support services for deployed and domestic telecommunication equipment and services, including:

* Radio Frequency (RF) systems troubleshooting and design
* Network analysis and integration
* SATCOM systems and sub-systems evaluation and testing
* Equipment installation, maintenance, and product support

#### Security Requirements

The successful bidder must have personnel with a background in satellite communications and sub-systems. The work will involve access to sensitive information and equipment, requiring a high level of security clearance.

#### Eligibility

Only bidders with a valid Tier 2 TBIPS Supply Arrangement (SA) with EN578-170432 series, which includes services in the National Capital Region for the following categories:

* Four (4) Level 1 - T.4 Junior Telecommunication Technicians
* Four (4) Level 2 - T.4 Intermediate Telecommunication Technicians
* One (1) Level 2 - T.5 Private Branch Exchange Technologist

are eligible to bid on this requirement.

#### Tendering Procedure

Selective tendering is the tendering procedure for this requirement.

#### Contract Authority

The Contract Authority for this tender is Diane Francoeur-Massia, who can be reached at Diane.Francoeur-Massia@forces.gc.ca.

#### Attachments

The tender documents are available on the Canada Buy Service website under the following links:

* [Link 1] https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/09/29/55fe857bf46aaa8a242e80d2f4b80ad1/w6369-22-p5oi_-_rfp_amdt_003_en.pdf
* [Link 2] https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/09/29/624308ec4aebd
